entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as a person who might have stolen the dog, but it's not clear if he actually did. (What di d it matter if Snape stole it, really?)

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend who is with him on their quest to find the mirror room. He is covered in the Cloak and is cold.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is trying to find the mirror room with Ron's help. He is determined to find it and is not willing to give up.

entities.name: the dog
entities.description: The dog is being guarded by a headed dog, but its significance in the story is unclear.

entities.name: the mirror room
entities.description: The mirror room is a location that Harry and Ron are trying to find. It's where Harry can see his parents' ghosts.

entities.name: the library
entities.description: The library is mentioned as the starting point for Harry and Ron's journey to find the mirror room.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are together on their quest to find the mirror room. (They tried retracing Harryâ€™s route from the library, wandering around the dark passageways for nearly an hour.)
Harry is searching for the mirror room with Ron's help. (What Harry feared most was that he might not be able to find the mirror room again.)
Ron is covered in the Cloak, which is a magical garment. (With Ron covered in the Cloak too, they had to walk much more slowly next night.)
Harry is approaching the mirror, where he can see his parents' ghosts. (They pushed the door open. Harry dropped the Cloak from round his shoulders and ran to the mirror.)
